acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleIntegerValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.IntegerValuePojo

Then the Object IntegerRangeValuesPojo ( intFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 intFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 intFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 1 intFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 489 integerObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 integerObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 36 integerObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 136 integerObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 145241 ) should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field 1 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field 489 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 36 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 136 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
